text: Preheat oven to 350Â°F. Grease or line a 13x9-inch pan.
Work {{crust_butter_choice}} into the flour mixture until a cohesive crumb forms.
Press the crust evenly into the pan. Bake 10 to 15 minutes, until lightly golden.
Whisk in {{filling_egg_choice}} (add eggs one at a time if using eggs) until combined.
Stir in {{filling_flour_choice}}, {{vinegar}}, and {{vanilla_extract}} just until smooth.
Pour the filling over the hot crust. Bake about 30 minutes, until the center is just set and slightly jiggly.
Cool to room temperature, then refrigerate at least 2 hours before slicing.
